channel.title: Adding npcs
channel.description: Hey all, im trying to add npcs to my 508 loading 525 (517) and i dnt no which folder the files are in... please help, a little extra info: my server source uses codeusa, im new to coding, and i just need to know some more info about npcs if you could give it to me, i would be greatly thankful

item.title: Adding npcs
item.dc:creator: @cocky cocky
item.description:
@cocky wrote:

Well, in my npc file, (last time I checked) it was sort of like this (not at home right now, I’ll post real code later.)

my ex.
Kalphite place
112 kalphite queen
321 kalphite soldier
etc. (I made up codes)
once again I will post up real code soon.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding npcs
item.dc:creator: @al_sk8r al sk8r
item.description:
@al_sk8r wrote:

hey adding npcs i had the same trouble doing it to when i was doing my first coding but now i think your go in your source and find npcs and they should pop up and u should be able to add new coords nets our either look up the npc id and do ::spawn id or i think its ::spawnnpc id u try it out this is all i can give u

Read full topic
